Class Player

java.lang.Object
  Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Player
extends Object
implements Serializable

Player: Defines a player object with a username, password, score, and a current hand of cards. All this is stored in a data base of an arraylist of Players.

Author:
Eddie
